data.message: Yes I have gay friends and love them, that does NOT mean I approve. Love the sinner, hate the sin.

replies.message: God will be the one to judge them, not you.
Christians ARE to make RIGHTEOUS JUDGEMENT based on Gods Word.
Even though it says in the bible you should not hate. Good job. Maybe you should get your facts straight before you jump on the bible train.
Hate the sin. Love the sinner.

Samuel D Telefonia O FACEBOOK SÓ SABE PBLOQUEAR AS PESSOAS DE BEM E AS DE MA INDOLE FICAM FAZENDO FALCATRUAS, E O PESSOA DO FACE NEM TE RESPONDE E NEM DÃO SATISFAÇAO PRA VC. SO MANDA VC ENTRAR NAS QUELAS PAGINAS ONDE TUODO MUNDO RECLMA A MESMA COISA E PERGUNTA A MESMO COISA. FUI BLOQUEAADO POR QUE....vc não ajudam em nada, so sabem bloquear as pessoas
Curtir (desfazer) · Responder ·QUERO RESPOSTA E SER DESBLOQUEADO;;;
You have too much time on your hands!!!!
Regretfully I have to agree. Living together unmarried is as sinful as homosexuals.
how  much have You for it???
No juegueis para que no seais jusgados, porque con la vara que mides seras medido.. mateo 5

How can you sit there and judge. The way people are is not a choice, its how they were born and who they are. Are we all so perfect we can judge who the sinners are. Look to yourselves first before judging others.
Theres no sin in real love, no matter who it is is,
